com.eco.bio7.batch

Class FileRoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.batch.FileRoot

  • public class FileRoot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static methods to get the Workspace, R, OpenOffice and script path location of the Bio7 application.
    Author:
    Bio7

      Constructor and Description
      FileRoot()

      Returns the export script path from the preferences.
